hero-testimonials.title: Success Stories from Our Community
hero-testimonials.description: Discover how Menteeno has transformed the careers and lives of professionals worldwide.

1.name: Sarah Johnson
1.content: Menteeno completely transformed my communication skills. The mentorship sessions were incredibly valuable, and I've seen a significant improvement in my team leadership abilities.

2.name: Ahmed Hassan
2.content: The personalized learning path helped me develop soft skills I never knew I needed. Now I'm more confident in presentations and team collaborations.

3.name: Maria Rodriguez
3.content: The real-world challenges and feedback from mentors were game-changers. I've been promoted twice since joining Menteeno!

4.name: David Chen
4.content: The community aspect is amazing. I've made valuable connections and learned from peers who faced similar challenges in their careers.

5.name: Lisa Thompson
5.content: Menteeno's approach to soft skills development is unique. The practical exercises and mentorship helped me become a better communicator and leader.

6.name: Omar Al-Rashid
6.content: The 30-day guarantee gave me confidence to try it, but I didn't need it. The results speak for themselves - my career has taken off!

hero-testimonials.footer: Join thousands of professionals who have transformed their careers with Menteeno

hero-faq.title: Got Questions? We've Got Answers
hero-faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about Menteeno and how we can help you develop your soft skills.

questions.mentorship-sessions: What are the mentorship sessions like?
questions.learning-path: How is the learning path personalized?
questions.support: What kind of support do you provide?

answers.what-is-menteeno: Menteeno is a comprehensive soft skills development platform that provides personalized learning paths, expert mentorship, real-world practice opportunities, and a supportive community to help professionals enhance their communication, leadership, and teamwork abilities.
answers.how-does-it-work: Menteeno works by first assessing your current soft skills through our evaluation system. Based on your results, we create a personalized learning plan. You'll have access to mentorship sessions with industry experts, participate in real-world challenges, and receive continuous feedback to track your progress.
answers.who-is-it-for: Menteeno is designed for professionals at any career stage who want to improve their soft skills. Whether you're a recent graduate, mid-level manager, or senior executive, our platform adapts to your specific needs and goals.
answers.mentorship-sessions: Our mentorship sessions are one-on-one private meetings with experienced professionals in your field. Each session lasts 60 minutes and focuses on specific soft skills areas. You'll receive personalized guidance, practical advice, and actionable strategies to improve your professional relationships and communication.
answers.learning-path: Your learning path is created based on your initial skills assessment and personal goals. It includes a mix of interactive modules, practical exercises, real-world scenarios, and regular evaluations. The path adapts as you progress, ensuring you're always working on the most relevant skills for your development.
answers.pricing: We offer flexible pricing plans to fit different needs and budgets. Our basic plan includes access to the learning platform and community, while premium plans add mentorship sessions and advanced features. All plans come with our 30-day money-back guarantee.
answers.guarantee: We're so confident in our platform that we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your progress or the quality of our service within the first 30 days, we'll refund your payment in full, no questions asked.
answers.support: We provide comprehensive support through multiple channels: email support for technical issues, community forums for peer support, regular check-ins with your assigned mentor, and access to our knowledge base with helpful resources and guides.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Menteeno, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform and services.

personal_info.title: Personal Information
personal_info.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, participate in mentorship sessions, or contact us for support. Phone number is required and email is optional:

usage_data.title: Usage Data
usage_data.content: We automatically collect certain information about your use of our services:

items.activity: Usage patterns and interactions with our platform

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to:

items.service: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.communication: Communicate with you about your account and our services
items.personalization: Personalize your learning experience and recommendations
items.improvement: Analyze usage patterns to improve our platform
items.legal: Comply with legal obligations and protect our rights

sharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties except in the following circumstances:

items.service_providers: With trusted service providers who assist us in operating our platform
items.legal_requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety
items.business_transfer: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
items.consent: With your explicit consent for specific purposes

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights and Choices
rights.content: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:

items.access: Access and review your personal information
items.deletion: Request deletion of your personal information
items.portability: Export your data in a portable format
items.objection: Object to certain processing of your information

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our platform. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings. For detailed information about our use of cookies, please see our Cookie Policy.

third_party.title: Third-Party Services
third_party.content: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties. We encourage you to review their privacy policies before providing any personal information.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date. Your continued use of our services after any modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Menteeno! These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of our platform and services. By accessing or using Menteeno, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account, accessing our platform, or using any of our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Menteeno.

service_description.title: Description of Service
service_description.content: Menteeno is a platform that provides mentorship and educational services, including but not limited to:

features.communication: Communication tools for mentors and mentees

registration.title: Account Registration
registration.content: To access certain features of our service, you must create an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.

responsibility.title: Account Responsibility
responsibility.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

user_conduct.title: User Conduct
user_conduct.content: You agree to use our service only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You are responsible for your conduct and content while using our platform.

items.illegal: Engaging in any illegal or unauthorized activities
items.harmful: Posting harmful, threatening, or offensive content
items.unauthorized: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems
items.impersonation: Impersonating others or providing false information

items.respectful: Treating all users with respect and professionalism
items.compliant: Complying with all applicable laws and regulations

our_content.title: Our Content
our_content.content: All content, features, and functionality of our service, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are owned by Menteeno and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

user_content.title: User Content
user_content.content: You retain ownership of any content you submit to our platform. By submitting content, you grant us a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, modify, and distribute such content in connection with our services.

privacy.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Our collection and use of personal information is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand our practices.

service_availability.title: Service Availability
service_availability.content: We strive to provide continuous service availability, but we do not guarantee that our service will be uninterrupted or error-free. We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our service at any time with or without notice.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Menteeno shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, or use, arising out of or relating to your use of our service.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to our service immediately, without prior notice, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will cease immediately.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms on our platform. Your continued use of our service after such modifications constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

governing_law.title: Governing Law
governing_law.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Iran, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Iran.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

answers.what-is-event: This is a 35-person meetup for technology professionals and enthusiasts that includes educational workshops, networking, and experience sharing.

answers.dress-code: Business casual attire is appropriate. Consider comfort and professionalism.
answers.parking: Free parking is available at the event venue. Limited capacity, so arrive early.
answers.food-beverages: Yes, complete catering including breakfast, lunch, dinner, and various beverages is provided.
answers.certificate: Yes, a valid event participation certificate is provided to all participants.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Cookie Policy explains how Menteeno uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website. It explains what these technologies are and why we use them, as well as your rights to control our use of them.

what_are_cookies.title: What Are Cookies?
what_are_cookies.content: Cookies are small data files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. Cookies are widely used by website owners to make their websites work, or to work more efficiently, as well as to provide reporting information.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.content: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular.

items.usage: Track how visitors use our website

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.content: These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.

session_cookies.title: Session Cookies
session_cookies.description: These are temporary cookies that expire when you close your browser. They help maintain your session while you navigate through our website.

preference_cookies.title: Preference Cookies
preference_cookies.description: These cookies remember your preferences and settings to provide a personalized experience on future visits.

analytics_cookies.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics_cookies.description: These cookies collect information about how you use our website, helping us improve our services and user experience.

third_party.title: Third-Party Cookies
third_party.content: Some cookies on our site are set by third-party services that appear on our pages. We do not control these cookies and you should check the third-party websites for more information about these.

google_analytics.title: Google Analytics
google_analytics.content: We use Google Analytics to analyze the use of our website. Google Analytics gathers information about website use by means of cookies.

social_media.title: Social Media
social_media.content: Our website may include social media features, such as sharing buttons, which may set cookies on your device.

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.content: You have the right to decide whether to accept or reject cookies. You can exercise your cookie rights by setting your preferences in the cookie settings or by using your browser settings.

browser_settings.title: Browser Settings
browser_settings.content: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings preferences. You can set your browser to refuse cookies or delete certain cookies.
browser_settings.chrome: Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies and other site data
browser_settings.firefox: Firefox: Options > Privacy & Security > Cookies and Site Data
browser_settings.safari: Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Manage Website Data
browser_settings.edge: Edge: Settings > Cookies and site permissions > Cookies and site data

our_preferences.title: Our Cookie Preferences
our_preferences.content: You can manage your cookie preferences through our cookie settings panel, which you can access at any time by clicking the cookie settings link in our footer.

impact.title: Impact of Disabling Cookies
impact.content: If you choose to disable cookies, some features of our website may not function properly. Essential cookies are required for the basic functionality of the website, so disabling them may prevent you from using certain features.

updates.title: Updates to This Cookie Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Cookie Policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Menteeno is a soft skills laboratory for the real world. We believe that professional success is not only dependent on technical expertise — but the ability to work as a team, solve problems, and communicate effectively plays a key role in becoming a vital part of the team. In Menteeno, participants enter real and challenging scenarios as a team; where they have to make decisions, negotiate, and take responsibility — just like the workplace! This experience is accompanied by the presence of a mentor, individual feedback, coaching sessions and the opportunity to learn from the experience of others. If you are looking for real growth in skills that few people teach, Menteeno is for you.
